# The **Helix** :pipeline: supports icons now

This :tada: will render as an icon. :thumbsup:

I said: this is cool. There are smiles :) - even **big :smiles:** and [:foo:](http://www.example.com/)

console.log('this is in a :code: block');

`this is inline :code:`
